about_the_game:
Collect letters, solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery of the missing eggs - all while riding a dinosaur!

In a land where people and dinosaurs live side-by-side, a rampaging carnotaurus has stormed the post office. There may be more to the situation than meets the eye, however. It's up to junior postmaster Pip and his best dino bud Parcel to recover the scattered letters and figure out what could have made a dinosaur so angry.



  • Cooperate with your adorable dinosaur Parcel to solve puzzles.
  • Use your trusty berry slingshot to shoot objects and tell Parcel where to go.
  • Explore the vibrant town of Cretaceous Cliffs.
  • Interact with over 10 quirky NPCs who will help you on your adventure.
  • In addition to collecting letters, deliver them to the right mailboxes and collect trinkets for Parcel.



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

name: Dino Delivery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 860
  • Storage: 3743 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3743 MB available space

short_description: Dino Delivery is a third person adventure/puzzle game about a boy and his dinosaur best friend and their quest to recover the lost mail of their town.
